name: Clumsy Crew
summary:
🎉 Welcome to Clumsy Crew!

A physics-driven platforming adventure that spills into your real-world environment.

Take control of a wobbly monster whose every step is equal parts goofy and unpredictable. Resize and reshape the game environment in Mixed Reality to fit your space as you jump, squish, and stumble toward the finish line.

👟 What to Expect

Bounce and tumble through colorful obstacle courses filled with moving platforms, hazards, and surprises.

Squish silly enemies underfoot and giggle at...
